What exactly <em>is</em> a hackathon, an: It's a really cool thing that we'll elaborate more on later.
Do I need experience to participate?: Nope! TechTogether welcomes people of all skill levels!

I don't have a team. Can I still hack?: We highly encourage everyone to find a team. <more later>
